article-creation-desc: Adds a more user-friendly article creation pageflow.
ac-action-indicator: {{SITENAME}} doesn't have an article called "$1". I want to...
ac-hover-tooltip-body-login: • You already have a user account and wish to edit under that name.
ac-action-signup-subtitle: I'd like to sign up and create articles.
ac-action-request-subtitle: Guide me through creating an article.
ac-action-request-subtitle-anon: Guide me through creating an article.
ac-hover-tooltip-body-request:
• You want to see the article exist, and
  • You do not wish to write it yourself.
ac-action-exit-subtitle: Oops. This isn't what I wanted.
ac-action-exit-subtitle-anon: Oops. This isn't what I wanted.
ac-hover-tooltip-body-exit: • You want to go back to previous page.
ac-hover-tooltip-body-draft:
• You haven't created an article before, or
  • You want to work on your article a bit before it's ready to publish
ac-create-warning-create:
Articles may be deleted immediately if:
  • they copy material from other sources
  • are overly promotional
  • do not clearly state why the subject is important
ac-hover-tooltip-body-create:
• You have created articles before, and
  • You are familiar with {{SITENAME}}'s policies, and
  • You do not have a conflict of interest regarding the subject matter of the article, and
  • You have several references about the subject.
ac-landing-login-required: In order to create an article, you need to have a {{SITENAME}} user account.
ac-create-dismiss: Skip this step in the future
